products.title: Rimini, White - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini, white - roller blind the rimini in white is a soft, fresh shade, perfect for adding light and air to any room it's placed in. Its pale colour and lightweight fabric mean that the room doesn't have to be dark every time you need a little privacy. <
products.productdescription: The rimini in white is a soft, fresh shade, perfect for adding light and air to any room it's placed in. Its pale colour and lightweight fabric mean that the room doesn't have to be dark every time you need a little privacy. Brighten up even the gloomiest of rooms by placing this blind in the window; it's ideal for small utility rooms or bathrooms. Alternatively, surround with pretty florals or bold bright shades in the bedroom or living room.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), White - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini (blackout), white - roller blind do you have trouble sleeping with nighttime lights and summertime sun? The rimini (blackout) range is specially designed to shield against harsh glares and unwanted light for a good night's sleep or day's relaxation
products.productdescription: Do you have trouble sleeping with nighttime lights and summertime sun? The rimini (blackout) range is specially designed to shield against harsh glares and unwanted light for a good night's sleep or day's relaxation, and this simple white edition does it with refined and classy style.Whilst the white will provide a refreshing lift to any surrounding, try balancing with a soothing lemon or muted lime walls for energising colour contrast. Add citrus-shaded fabrics and features for a continuous zesty theme and a reviving look and feel.
